channel.title: Need help with web client
channel.description:
so i use godaddy for my hosting. for one.
i have built my own server. and i have a Index.htm file in my Server folder. and i uploaded the whole server file to my websites root. AKA my host.
but when i browse to : www.mywebsite.com/pk/index.htm it still says error: click here for details. so i click and it says:
CLASS NOT FOUND EXCEPTION
Loader.class
Help? this is my first time actually Publishing to a web site.

item.title: Need help with web client
item.dc:creator: @jessessoulmate jessessoulmate
item.description:
@jessessoulmate wrote:

Ok guys i will try that. =)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with web client
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

owns reece:

you need to jar your client then upload the jar after that upload the index.htm on its own not in the server folder

And if this doesn’t work, make sure you’re selecting the bin folder and not the src. Or in other words the .class files and not the .java files. The run.bat and compile.bat also aren’t needed.

Read full topic
